About Us

Established in 2018, Professional Scaffolding Service brings together members who have been in the scaffolding industry for decades. We take pride in their experience and work ethic, which enable us to provide high-quality work to our clients. With the cuplock scaffold system, we are able to quickly and efficiently erect and dismantle scaffolds for the Industrial and Commercial markets throughout California.

© Professional Scaffolding Service
